short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically marks non-star cells in rows, columns, and diagonals around stars in Star Battle puzzles, ensuring no adjacent stars.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Star Blocker: Streamline Your Star Battle Puzzle Solving

Star Blocker is the essential tool for Star Battle enthusiasts on Puzzle Baron. This Chrome extension automatically marks cells in rows, columns, and diagonals around placed stars, ensuring you never place adjacent stars. Simplify your puzzle-solving process and enhance your gameplay experience with Star Blocker.

Features:

Automatic Marking: Instantly fills cells with dots in rows, columns, and diagonals around each placed star.
User-Friendly: Simple and intuitive interface designed for both novice and experienced players

.
Whether you're new to Star Battle or a seasoned solver, Star Blocker helps you solve puzzles faster and more efficiently. Download Star Blocker now and take your Star Battle skills to the next level!
